name: Samurai Shodown III: Blades of Blood
name_original: Samurai Shodown III: Blades of Blood
description:
Samurai Shodown III: Blades of Blood is a fighting game developed by SNK and Ukiyotei. It came out on 15-11-1995. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Samurai Shodown III: Blades of Blood on Neo Geo, PlayStation and SEGA Saturn.
It was produced by Eikichi Kawasaki.
